title: Dance Central™ 3
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese. This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor. The #1-selling dance franchise for Kinect™ is back with new features and an electrifying soundtrack featuring 40+ new tracks! From ‘70s disco grooves to current chart-topping dance hits, Dance Central™ 3 will have you mastering the biggest dance crazes of the past and the hottest moves of today. With brand-new, party-ready multiplayer modes, “Beginner” difficulty, and an epic Story mode, it’s the biggest dance game yet. Get ready to own the dance floor with Dance Central 3 -- only on Kinect for Xbox 360.

childDownloads.description: Master new moves and build your track library by purchasing this song/dance: “Airplanes” by B.o.B. ft. Hayley. For music credits, visit www.DanceCentral.com. Dance Central 3 is a Kinect Required game.

childDownloads.title: Dance Central 3 DJ
childDownloads.description: Dance Central 3 DJ gives you control of the best party on Kinect! Get your friends on the dance floor and use your SmartGlass enabled device to queue up killer playlists, view and share photos, and ratchet up the fun! You can also check your leaderboard rankings, track challenges, set fitness goals, and more! With Dance Central 3 DJ, the party never stops!
